thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Joel Siev
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Joel Siev

author: Joel Siev
title: Joel Siev
text: We worked with Cindy Peck-incredibly helpful and easy to work with. She would call or email almost immediately whenever we had a question. Very knowledgeable about everything in Costa Rica. Great suggestions for hotels/tours/restaurants/etc. The best thing is that they take care of everything-no worries while in Costa Rica. All of our drivers were prompt, professional-all spoke English well. The bottom line is that whatever was supposed to happen just happened--the drivers were always there, no issues with any of the hotels or excursions we booked. All incredibly easy. I don't think you can go to Costa Rica any other way.
